{"id":309658509,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1583437291,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/309658509/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"12.3 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def trap(self, height):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type height: List[int]\n        :rtype: int\n        \"\"\"\n        l_max, r_max = float(\"-inf\"), float(\"-inf\")\n        l, r = 0, len(height) - 1\n        ans = 0\n        while l < r:\n            if height[l] < height[r]:\n                if height[l] < l_max:\n                    ans += (l_max - height[l])\n                else:\n                    l_max = height[l]\n                l += 1\n            else:\n                if height[r] < r_max:\n                    ans += (r_max - height[r])\n                else:\n                    r_max = height[r]\n                r -= 1\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
